summary: This module provides a comprehensive set of unit tests for the Django admin components of the registrar system, verifying correct ordering of foreign‑key fields, read‑only behavior, sortable and filterable list views, session variable management, and role‑specific field configurations across domain, user, contact, invitation, and application models.
business_intent: Validate that the administrative backend enforces business rules and delivers a reliable, permission‑aware UI for managing domains, users, contacts, invitations, and related data within the registrar application.
